headline: HomeStreet (HMST) Reports Q1 Loss, Tops Revenue Estimates
summary: HomeStreet (HMST) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -114.29% and 2.19%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: The Market May Be About To Get Turned Upside Down
summary: With the rise of AI, traditional index funds like SPY and QQQ could face challenges. Read why infrastructure and farmland could become the biggest winners.
